name: Prof. Dr. Pran Gopal Datta
description: Prof. Dr. Pran Gopal Datta is a Ear, Nose & Throat Specialist & Head Neck Surgeon doctor in Dhaka. His qualification is MBBS, MCPS, ACORL, PhD, MSc (Audiology), FCPS (ENT), FRCS (Glasgow). He is a Professor in the Department of ENT at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Green Life Hospital, Dhaka. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Pran Gopal Datta at Green Life Hospital, Dhaka is 8am to 11am & 4pm to 8pm (Closed: Tuesday, Thursday & Friday).

name: Dr. Asaduzzaman Biddut
address: House # 1 & 3 , Road # 2, Block # B, Mirpur 10, Dhaka
description: Dr. Asaduzzaman Biddut is a Cancer Specialist doctor in Dhaka. His qualification is MBBS (SSMC), MD (Oncology). He is a Assistant Professor in the Department of Medical Oncology at National Institute of Cancer Research & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Aalok Healthcare & Hospital, Mirpur 10. Practicing hour of Dr. Asaduzzaman Biddut at Aalok Healthcare & Hospital, Mirpur 10 is 5.30pm to 9pm (Sat, Sun, Mon & Wed).

name: Dr. Nurun Nahar Fatema
description: Dr. Nurun Nahar Fatema Begum is a Pediatrics Cardiologist doctor in Dhaka. Her qualification is MBBS, FCPS (PED), FRCP (EDIN), FACC (USA), FSCAI (USA). She is working as a Pediatrics Cardiologist doctor in Combined Military Hospital, Dhaka. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Labaid Specialized Hospital, Dhanmondi. Practicing hour of Dr. Nurun Nahar Fatema Begum at Labaid Specialized Hospital, Dhanmondi is 4pm to 6.30pm (Closed: Friday).

name: Prof. Dr. Md. Abdul Mannan
description: Prof. Dr. Md. Abdul Mannan is a Pediatric & Neonatology Specialist doctor in Dhaka. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS, MD (Pediatric), MD (Neonatology), NUH (Singapore). He is working as a Pediatric & Neonatology Specialist doctor in Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Labaid Specialized Hospital, Dhanmondi. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Md. Abdul Mannan at Labaid Specialized Hospital, Dhanmondi is 6pm to 9.30pm (Friday: 10am to 12pm).

name: Prof. Dr. Suraiya Harun
address: House # 02, Road # 05, Green Road, Dhanmondi, Dhaka - 1205
description: Prof. Dr. Suraiya Harun is a Neonatal & Child Diseases Specialist doctor in Dhaka. Her qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health) DCH, FCCP (USA), Fellowship in Neonatology (Thailand, AIMS). She is a Former Professor & Head in the Department of Pediatrics at Brahmanbaria Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Central Hospital Limited, Dhaka. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Suraiya Harun at Central Hospital Limited, Dhaka is 11am to 2pm (Closed: Tuesday & Friday).

name: Dr. Melia Choudhury
address: House # 12/A, Road # 05, Mirpur Main Road, Dhanmondi, Dhaka
description: Dr. Melia Choudhury is a Phaco, Glaucoma & Extraocular Surgeon doctor in Dhaka. Her qualification is MBBS, DO, MS (EYE). She is a Associate Professor in the Department of Ophthalmology at Holy Family Red Crescent Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Harun Eye Foundation Hospital, Dhanmondi. Practicing hour of Dr. Melia Choudhury at Harun Eye Foundation Hospital, Dhanmondi is 4.30pm to 7.30pm (Closed: Friday).
